Item.desc: HP stealing moves restore double HP. Cannot be used by Trainers.
+2 to Speed Evasion. Cannot be used by Trainers.
The user rolls +2d6 during the Introduction Stage of a Contest. Cannot be used by Trainers.
When held, once per Contest, the holder may re-roll any 1s made when using a Tough Move. Cannot be used by Trainers.
When held, once per Contest, the holder may re-roll any 1s made when using a Cool Move. Cannot be used by Trainers.
When held, once per Contest, the holder may re-roll any 1s made when using a Cute Move. Cannot be used by Trainers.
When held, once per Contest, the holder may re-roll any 1s made when using a Smart Move. Cannot be used by Trainers.
When held, once per Contest, the holder may re-roll any 1s made when using a Beauty Move. Cannot be used by Trainers.
Evolution is prevented for the holder. Cannot be used by Trainers.
The user does not take damage from Sandstorm. Head Item for Trainers.
The Holder's Speed is halved, and any immunity to Ground Type is lost. Hand Item for Trainers. Standard Action to drop.
The Lagging Items are tied to a specific Stat. When held, they set that Stat to -4 Combat Stages. Cannot be used by Trainers. Standard Action to drop.
The holder is immune to Moves with the Powder Keyword. Accessory or Head Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Fighting-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Dark-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Fire-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Dragon-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Rock-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Electric-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Steel-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers. Can be used by Onix and Scyther to evolve.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Grass-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Water-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Poison-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Flying-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Fairy-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Bug-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Ground-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Ghost-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Ice-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Psychic-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
The user does not take damage from Hail. Accessory Item for Trainers.
Lowers the user's HP Base Stat 1.
Lowers the user's Attack Base Stat 1.
Lowers the user's Defense Base Stat 1.
Lowers the user's Special Attack Base Stat 1.
Lowers the user's Special Defense Base Stat 1.
Lowers the user's Speed Base Stat 1.
A bit of colored energized crystal used for various crafting purposes. Blue Shards are associated with Water, Ice, and Flying types.
A bit of colored energized crystal used for various crafting purposes. Green Shards are associated with Bug, Grass, and Ground types.
A bit of colored energized crystal used for various crafting purposes. Red Shards are associated with Fire, Fairy, and Psychic types.
A bit of colored energized crystal used for various crafting purposes. Yellow Shards are associated with Electric, Rock, and Steel types.
A bit of colored energized crystal used for various crafting purposes. Orange Shards are associated with Normal, Fighting, and Dragon types.
A bit of colored energized crystal used for various crafting purposes. Violet Shards are associated with Poison, Dark, and Ghost types.
Increases the Pokemon's Attack by two Combat Stages
Increases the Pokemon's Defense by two Combat Stages
Increases the Pokemon's Special Attack by two Combat Stages
Increases the Pokemon's Special Defense by two Combat Stages
Increases the Pokemon's Speed by two Combat Stages
Increases Critical Hit Range of all moves by +2.
Increases Accuracy by +2
Prevents reduction of Combat Stages or Accuracy on the Pokemon for 5 Turns

Snack. Grants a Digestion Buff that heals 5 Hit Points.
Snack. Grants a Digestion Buff that heals 5 Hit Points. May be used as Bait
Snack. When their Digestion Buff is traded in, the user recovers 1/16th of their max Hit Points at the beginning of each turn for the rest of the encounter.

Poison-Type Pokemon may consume the Black Sludge as a Snack Item; when the Digestion Buff is traded in, they recover 1/8th of their Max Hit Points at the beginning of each turn for the rest of the encounter.
Heals 25 Hit Points - Repulsive
Cure all Persistent Status Afflictions - Repulsive
Lasts 1 hour; causes Pokemon of level 15 or lower to flee
Lasts 2 hour; causes Pokemon of level 25 or lower to flee
